text: At around 04:00 CAT on 7 December 2021, a fire broke out in an overcrowded prison in Gitega, Burundi. It killed at least 38 people and injured over 69 others. ==References== Category:2021 disasters in Africa Category:2021 fires Category:Building and structure fires Category:Burundi Category:December 2021 events Category:Prisons
title: Gitega prison fire
